name: Simple Air Miles Tracker
description: Turn daily expenses into business class flightsAir Miles track can easily keep track of all your accumulated air miles and kick-start your journey towards your first free flight.Are you already using credit cards to pay for your daily expenses? Contrary to popular beliefs, business class flights are actually within reach for many of us. In the last few years, I have collected over half a million air miles.Simply using the right reward programs could make the difference between a budget flight an
features: Summary of air miles with frequent flyer and reward programs; Keep track of expiring reward points; Take note of important information such as annual fee, renewal dates and earn rates; Attach documents or screenshots such as air miles redemption charts; Search, filter and sort data; Notion template; Tutorial guide on how to use the template; Sample entries included to demonstrate usage; Lifetime access and updates; Who is this template for?This course is for everyone who wants to better track and manage paid subscriptions and save money.
